PerfectNetExp.abs: 地质专业英语词汇(E-F) ... excretion 分泌 exemplar 标本 exfoliation 鳞剥.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... cellar 地窖 exemplar 模范，典型 altar 祭坛.
简单地说，临摹就是一种透过范例(exemplar)的学习过程，学习者需要不断地注意范例的细节处理与整体布局，并且将自身放置在范例 …
的、清楚的样本(exemplar)的基础之上的，然后将其他实例根据它们跟这些好的、清楚的样本在某些/一组属性上的相似性而归入该范畴。

list.abs: interferogram region spreading technology based on exemplar matching ., 基于样本匹配的干涉图延拓技术研究.

their most fashionable exemplar is the Murray-Darling basin in Australia , where they have enabled farmers to withstand a fearsome drought without impact on agricultural production .他们中最流行的典范是澳大利亚墨累达令盆地，该地现已使农民能禁得起可怕的干旱而使其农业生产不受影响。
执行功能 executive Function范例策略 exemplar strategy竭尽式扫瞄程式 exhaustive scanning procedure.
facture of new craftwork for pheasant zoology exemplar ., 雉鸡生态标本制作新工艺.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French exemplaire, from late Latin exemplarium, from Latin exemplum 'sample, imitation' (see example)

entry.def: An exemplar is someone or something that is considered to be so good that they should be copied or imitated.

example.ex: They viewed their new building as an exemplar of taste.
example.tran: 他们认为他们的新大厦品位独特，可作为典范。

entry.def: An exemplar is a typical example of a group or class of things.

example.ex: One of the wittiest exemplars of the technique was M. C. Escher.
example.tran: 最为巧妙地运用那种技巧的一个典型人物就是M.C.埃舍尔。

sentences.sentence: "he is the very model of a modern major general"
